Nodes.Comment: Extra "let's talk" comment for when the pred branch doesn't do that

Children.Title: Just One
Children.Tooltip: The fool in your gut now is the first.

Children.Title: Pleasure
Children.Tooltip: Because it's stimulating like nothing else.

Children.Title: Necessity
Children.Tooltip: Because surely you are allowed to defend yourself.

Children.Title: Food
Children.Tooltip: Because it's a convenient source of nutrition.

Children.Title: Power
Children.Tooltip: Because having such absolute control over prey is intoxicating.

Children.Title: Vigilante
Children.Tooltip: Because you want to take bad people out - your way.

Children.Title: Protection
Children.Tooltip: Because there is someone you want to protect.

Children.Title: Several
Children.Tooltip: [Lie] A bunch, probably.

Children.Title: Few
Children.Tooltip: The thug wasn't the first.

Children.Title: Many
Children.Tooltip: You do enjoy 'partaking' every now and then.

Children.Title: Justice
Children.Tooltip: Ask what kind of fate is in store for the Maw members.

Children.Title: Kidnapping
Children.Tooltip: Mention that you saw evidence of 'prey storage' in the amber mine.

Children.Title: Pred Club
Children.Tooltip: Mention the underground fighting ring in North Finmer.

Children.Title: Repayment
Children.Tooltip: Ask how those affected by the Red Maw will be compensated.

Children.Title: Rux & Randall
Children.Tooltip: Ask Rux what the wolf is to him.

Children.Title: South Finmer
Children.Tooltip: Ask what South Finmer is doing to help.

Children.Title: Done
Children.Tooltip: Nothing else to add.

Children.Title: Yes
Children.Tooltip: We are better than them.

Children.Title: No
Children.Tooltip: They don't deserve that kind of mercy.

Children.Title: Let's go
Children.Tooltip: Of course this wouldn't go smoothly.

ScriptAction.Script:
local fight = MQ06_MakeCombat_Ambush()
fight:Begin()

if fight:IsGrappling(Player) then
    Log("MQ06_AMBUSH03_GRAPPLE")
else
    Log("MQ06_AMBUSH03")
end

Children.Title: Keep going
Children.Tooltip: Time to get out of here.

ScriptAction.Script:
SaveData.TakeCheckpoint(true)
if Player.TotalPreyDigested > 0 then
    if Storage.GetFlag("MQ06_AMBUSH_THUG_EATEN") then
        Log("MQ06_ABBEY_INTRO09_PRED_THUG")
    else
        Log("MQ06_ABBEY_INTRO09_PRED_ANY")
    end
else
    Log("MQ06_ABBEY_INTRO09_DEFAULT")
end

Children.Title: Fight
Children.Tooltip: Come on, then.

ScriptAction.Script:
local fight = MQ06_MakeCombat_Fight1()
fight:Begin()
LogSplit()
Log("MQ06_ABBEY_FIGHT1_END01")

Children.Title: Wait
Children.Tooltip: The fight is already over, and he knows it too.

Children.Title: Swallow
Children.Tooltip: Looks like defenseless prey.

Nodes.Snippet:
-- Manually increase vore counters because we circumvent combat
Player.TotalPreySwallowed = Player.TotalPreySwallowed + 1
Player.TotalPreyDigested = Player.TotalPreyDigested + 1

Children.Title: Health
Children.Tooltip: That cut looked nasty. Ask if it's healing alright.

Children.Title: Canbell
Children.Tooltip: Ask where Acting Mayor Canbell went.

Children.Title: Mako
Children.Tooltip: You captured one Red Maw member alive. Where is he?

Children.Title: Rux
Children.Tooltip: Ask what Rux is going to do now.

Children.Title: Farewell
Children.Tooltip: Who knows what's next in store?
